department: Real Property and Assets Directorate, Parks Canada
description: Asset assessment services for long term sustainability of Parks Canada
full_summary:
**Eastern Canada Asset Condition Assessment 2023 – Real Property & Assets Directorate**
==============================================

**Tender Notice**
---------------

The Government of Canada has issued a tender notice for the Eastern Canada Asset Condition Assessment 2023. The procurement process is a Request for Proposal (RFP) seeking engineering services to assess the condition of assets in Eastern Canada.

**Contract Opportunity**
--------------------

The contract opportunity is for the provision of engineering services to carry out asset assessments and produce funding estimates to support the long-term sustainability of Parks Canada’s assets. The contract is expected to be awarded to up to three (3) service providers, one for each of the following geographic zones: Quebec, Ontario, and Atlantic.

**Key Dates**
------------

*   Tender Closing Date: June 29, 2023, at 14:00:00
*   Expected Contract Start Date: July 13, 2023
*   Expected Contract End Date: March 4, 2024

**Eligibility Criteria**
----------------------

To be eligible for this opportunity, service providers must be able to demonstrate their expertise and skills in engineering services related to asset assessment and condition evaluation.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

Bids must be submitted in electronic format, with the bid documents and attachments sent as email attachments to soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. The bid submittal must also be faxed to 1-855-983-1808.

**Important Notes**
-----------------

*   Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted.
*   The Government of Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
*   Late submissions will not be considered.

**Additional Information**
------------------------

For more information, please refer to the solicitation documents available on the Government of Canada’s tendering service at www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities. Contact the Contracting Officer for any questions or concerns. Do not hesitate to contact Parks Canada at soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca for any inquiries. We can be reached by telephone at (873) 355-8841. Our fax number is 1-855-983-1808. We also encourage you to review the documents carefully and get in touch with us if you have any further questions! Ended. ) [  close markdown ](  }
